entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Wunnummin Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:27 AM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 47 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 23. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Thursday 23 February 2023
